name: lame planet generator with astronaut and spaceship and spacestation and stuff!.. not finished
name_original: lame planet generator with astronaut and spaceship and spacestation and stuff!.. not finished
description:
This is lame
if anyone wants to make a game together I'm open to suggestions

Controls are:
WASD : movement
E : to collect rocks
F : to grab a cargo box
G : to load a cargo box on the ship
Q : to get aboard the ship
fly close to the docking port of the space station with low relative velocity to dock with it
R : to undock
Mouse Wheel : to zoom camera
